casebody.data:
No. 10-5208. Jerry Marshall, Jr., Petitioner v. Jeffrey A. Beard, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 1111, 131 S. Ct. 819, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9691.

178 L. Ed. 2d 560,

December 13, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
